title: ‘I Try to Be a Fair Sprinter’: Jasper Philipsen Plays Defense After Critics Call out Tour de France Aggression
content:
Philipsen issues apology to Wout van Aert, defends tactics amid growing concerns over Tour de France sprint safety.

Read the full article at ‘I Try to Be a Fair Sprinter’: Jasper Philipsen Plays Defense After Critics Call out Tour de France Aggression on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
